title: MUMBLE_SET_VOICE_TARGET
content:
0x960A4A95// MumbleSetVoiceTarget
void MUMBLE_SET_VOICE_TARGET(int targetId);Parameters:targetId: A Mumble voice target ID, ranging from 1..30 (inclusive). 0 disables voice targets, and 31 is server loopback.Sets the current Mumble voice target ID to broadcast voice to.
